name: baroquely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also Baroquely) in a way that relates to or looks like Baroque architecture or design: The stairs leading to the ballroom had a baroquely carved railing. The paintings were displayed in baroquely gilded frames.
in a style that is complicated, often in a way that is not necessary: The baroquely designed stage set gave the audience too much to look at and distracted from the actors' performances. The restaurant's menu was baroquely composed, fusing elements from cuisines from three different continents.
More examplesFewer examplesA baroquely complex tapestry hung over the bed. His baroquely tattooed arm had so much detail in the design that you could spend an hour looking at it and keep seeing new things.
